column4: U.S. Supreme Court weighs Microsoft overseas data fight
column5: WASHINGTON A major privacy rights fight between Microsoft Corp and the Justice Department reaches the Supreme Court this week  with the justices considering whether U.S. law allows prosecutors to compel technology companies to hand over data stored overseas.

column4: RPT-U.S. Supreme Court weighs Microsoft overseas data fight
column5: WASHINGTON  Feb 25 A major privacy rights fight between Microsoft Corp and the Justice Department reaches the Supreme Court this week  with the justices considering whether U.S. law allows prosecutors to compel technology companies to hand over data stored overseas.

column4: BRIEF-Nokia  Intel And Verizon Collaborate On New Virtualized RAN Architectures
column5: * NOKIA  INTEL AND VERIZON COLLABORATE ON NEW VIRTUALIZED RAN ARCHITECTURES ON PATH TO COMMERCIALIZATION

column4: Broadcom calls Qualcomm's offer for price talks 'engagement theater'
column5: Broadcom Ltd  on Monday called a proposal by U.S. semiconductor peer Qualcomm Inc  for a new meeting to negotiate an increase to Broadcom's $117 billion acquisition offer "engagement theater" aimed at dodging a takeover battle.

column4: UPDATE 6-Broadcom calls Qualcomm's offer for price talks 'engagement theater'
